decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to put pressure on the opponent quickly through aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while disrupting their game plan with countermagic like Force of Will and Daze. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Wasteland and Lightning Bolt, and uses cards like Mishra's Bauble and Brainstorm to ensure card advantage and card selection. Additionally, Murktide Regent provides a powerful threat that can help close out games quickly. Overall, this deck is focused on a fast and disruptive game plan to secure victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's entire library in one turn. It uses cards like Goblin Welder and Enlightened Tutor to tutor for the combo pieces, while also utilizing disruptive cards like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast to protect the combo. Karn, the Great Creator provides additional utility and control elements, while cards like City of Traitors and Simian Spirit Guide help accelerate the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a win.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly assemble the necessary cards to cast Doomsday and then win the game by using Thassa's Oracle to draw a card and win the game by having no cards in the library. The deck is focused on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal, while also having disruption with cards like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo. It also includes card selection and filtering with Ponder and Brainstorm to help find the necessary cards to execute the combo efficiently.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, such as Griselbrand and Emrakul, then bringing them back into play using cards like Reanimate and Goryo's Vengeance. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Unmask to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By combining graveyard manipulation with powerful reanimation spells, the deck aims to create lethal threats and overwhelm the opponent before they can establish a strong board presence.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with high-powered creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then bringing them back into play with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats that can be brought back from the graveyard faster than they can deal with them. Additionally, disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will are included to protect the combo pieces and ensure the deck can execute its game plan effectively.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to mill the entire library, then win the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck utilizes cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to accelerate mana production, while using cards like Boggart Trawler and Undercity Informer to fill the graveyard. The combo is protected with Pact of Negation, and there are ways to recur key pieces with cards like Dread Return and Reanimate. The deck aims to win in a single explosive turn, catching opponents off guard with its powerful combo potential.

This deck revolves around quickly ramping up mana using Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors to drop powerful threats like Pyrogoyf, Karn, the Great Creator, and Broadside Bombardiers. It aims to disrupt opponents with cards like Blood Moon and Shatterskull Smashing while dealing damage with Fury and Sundering Eruption. The inclusion of Chrome Mox and Lotus Petal allows for explosive starts, and The One Ring provides a powerful late-game threat. Ultimately, the deck combines aggro elements with a strong focus on disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure victory.

The deck focuses on using the graveyard as a resource to quickly fill it with creatures and spells, enabling powerful combos and interactions. It utilizes cards like Faithless Looting and Golgari Thug to dump cards into the graveyard, while also having ways to bring creatures back like Dread Return and Bridge from Below. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flood of creatures and generate value through sacrificing and recurring them. It is a fast and explosive deck that can win games in a single turn through careful setup and execution.

The main idea behind this deck is to use Painter's Servant to change all cards in your opponent's deck to a specific color, then use Grindstone to mill them out with a combo win condition. Goblin Engineer and Welder are used to tutor for combo pieces, while cards like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast help to protect the combo. Urza's Saga provides additional artifact synergies and can help tutor for key pieces. Overall, the deck aims to quickly set up its combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.
